# API Guide

This document provides API documentation examples.

## Overview

The API uses REST principles and returns JSON responses.

## Endpoints

- `/api/v1/docs` - List all documentation
- `/api/v1/build` - Trigger a build

## See Also

- [Getting Started](./getting-started.md) for initial setup
- [Configuration](./configuration.md) for advanced options
